dataList.place: Central Front in the Smoke War
dataList.content: Still in a battlefield…

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: …It’s the same place as before. Though, something about it is different.
There was a strong tug at Heathcliff’s coat from behind.

dataList.title: Reminisced Soldier
dataList.content: Are you out of your minds? Get to shelter, now! You’ll age rapidly if exposed to that bomb’s blast.

dataList.title: Reminisced Soldier
dataList.content: The Nest next to ours turned into a nursing home—they can’t even walk without sticks!
Hold on, isn’t he the same guy we just…

dataList.title: Reminisced Soldier
dataList.content: It’s not a problem, because Manager Gregor is with us!

dataList.title: Reminisced Soldier
dataList.content: He doesn’t suffer side effects like the rest of us, and he can regenerate his arm, too!

dataList.title: Reminisced Soldier
dataList.content: He was operated on by none other than Hermann, our most skilled director.

dataList.title: Reminisced Soldier
dataList.content: A hero shouldn’t be on the rearguard. I’ll give you a ride!
Wh-What the hell? Get away from me!
Four pairs of wings emerged from his back, clicking and twitching.

dataList.title: Reminisced Soldier
dataList.content: Why are you running? You should raise G Corp’s banner and take the lead on the frontlines!
I…
I never wanted any of this… Not the procedure, nor the war…

dataList.title: Reminisced Soldier
dataList.content: Take the lead… Take… T…
Tomah’s mouth opens unnaturally, and a pair of long antennae begin to grow from his face.
Yeek… We gotta fight them again? My stomach is gonna turn…
What is that display of weakness? Do you wish to be punished for insubordination?
<…I think we should run here?>
An excellent plan, Manager. You know when to strike and when to withdraw.
…The hell is her deal?
…Retreat is not an option.
I don’t get it. I heard every employee under the corporation had modifications, but it can’t have been this foul.
What we see here may differ from actual accounts.
The path was opened by Gregor’s feelings rather than his memories.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: …This is how he felt in his heart about his own allies.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Did all the employees in your Wing… receive the augmentation procedure?
…Most did.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Was it done with their consent? That’s so…
Did the people in L Corp. consent to offering themselves up to Abnormalities?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: That’s… I heard that was written on the contract.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: We were never properly informed, though… They said such routine procedures should be skipped for efficient management…

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: That we should face the fear.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: In the end… anyone who joined the corporation agreed to it, knowingly or not.
…Can guess how it went for us, then.
